For BCS Preliminary, Written and Viva exam, English grammar rules Voice, Narration, parts of Speech, Number, Gender, Transformation of Sentences, Spelling mistakes, Appropriate Preposition, Right Form of Verbs, Phrases and Idioms and other rules, explanations and practice sets.

BCS Preliminary, Written and Viva Exam related English Literature topics - Renaissance, Victorian, Neo Classical, Romantic, Modern and Post Modern period literature works, authors, poets, quotes and related information and practice sets.
